events.message: The customer filed a claim after their car was involved in a minor collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under auto accident due to the keywords and description provided by the claimant.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim promptly.
The customer received acknowledgment of their claim submission along with instructions on next steps.
Required documents including the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and proof of insurance were requested from the claimant.
Customer submitted all requested documents on time, including the collision report and multiple photos showing damages.
The investigation team began assessing the validity of the claim and verifying the submitted evidence for the auto accident.
The investigation concluded successfully, confirming that the claimant was not at fault and damages were consistent with the report.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the claimant to cover repair costs and rental vehicle expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the promptness of the claim process and clear communication from the agent.
The claim was officially approved, authorizing the payout for vehicle repairs and associated costs.
Payment was successfully issued to the repair shop as well as reimbursement for rental car days as per the policy.
The claim was closed following payment, with confirmation that all repair work was completed and the customer was satisfied.
The case file was archived as per company protocol, preserving all documentation and correspondence related to the auto accident claim.
